resources.string: Drinking a wine you like? Drync scours millions of listings to find the wine you're drinking along with reviews, ratings and prices.
Quickly jot a note about a wine you're drinking. Search and add it to your cellar when you've got more time.
Add wines to your Virtual Cellar to remember them later, share or track your collection.
Press the search key to look up a word
Find your wine by typing a few words from the wine label into the search bar above.
You don't need to type in all the details - just make sure you give Drync enough to work with, like "2004 inman pinot" or "chateau margaux 2001".
You must configure Twitter first, in the "Settings" tab!
